title: Mantis BS4 Style Ceiling Lamp
body: Minimalist yet brimming with creativity, our style of the 1951 Mantis BS4 Ceiling Lamp by Bernard Schottlander is a shining example of the sophisticated, thoughtful light fixtures that portrays the classic feel of the early 50’s. Its wide radius allows it to illuminate even the largest living or dining room, while the adjustable shades mean that the light can be brightened or softened depending on the mood.
